archimate:ApplicationService.name: Service Endpoint
archimate:ApplicationService.documentation: An addressable network location offering a service operated on behalf of an Entity. As defined in the DID specification, a Service Endpoint is expressed as a URI (Uniform Resource Identifier). In the Sovrin Network, a Cloud Agent uses a specific type of Service Endpoint as specified by the Sovrin Protocol. See Appendix F.
